posts.title: Giant Moscow Mule Mug
posts.content: Put your alcohol tolerance to the ultimate test by enjoying a Moscow Mule or two from this giant mug. This ginormous 192 ounce capacity mug features a solid copper body with lined nickel that is complemented by a large and sturdy brass handle.

posts.title: Potty Texter Toilet Smartphone Holder
posts.content: Usher your bathroom visits into the 21st century by placing your smartphone on the Potty Texter. This totally necessary bathroom accessory conveniently holds your smartphone so that you can text, tweet, sext, or take selfies to your heart’s content.

posts.title: Jestik Contoured Ergonomic Keyboard
posts.content: Boost productivity and improve your comfort level while you work on your PC by swapping out your outdated keyboard for the Jestik contoured ergonomic keyboard. It features separate key wells so that your hands are in a more relaxed and natural position.

posts.title: World’s Smallest Solar Powered Car
posts.content: Witness the power of the sun by placing the world’s smallest solar powered car under sunlight. This pint-sized vehicle comes equipped with a small rectangular solar panel that covers the entire roof area and powers this tiny ride.

posts.title: Air Lock Bag Resealer
posts.content: Keep your favorite foods and snacks from going stale with help from the Air Lock bag resealer. Just one swipe is all it takes for the new micro-thermal technology of this compact appliance to create an airtight seal that will keep your food fresh.

posts.title: Smart Tire Safety Monitor
posts.content: Reduce your chances of getting a flat while you’re on the road by monitoring your tires with the smart tire safety monitor. Four Bluetooth sensors mount to the valve stems of your vehicle’s tires so that you can easily monitor your tires’s conditions from your smartphone.

posts.title: Ice Cream Lock
posts.content: Keep that delicious pint of ice cream safe and secure from your fellow gluttons with this ice cream pint lock. Designed perfectly for a Ben and Jerry’s pint of ice cream, these sturdy locks are perfect for deterring ice cream thieves at home or in the office.

posts.title: Morning Recovery Hangover Cure Drink
posts.content: Save yourself a morning of agony after a fun night of punishing your liver with the Morning Recovery hangover cure drink. This vegan-friendly life-giving elixir contains a blend of ingredients designed to aid in detoxing your body so that you can rebound faster.

posts.title: Where’s Waldo Mural
posts.content: Ensure your productivity takes a plunge by decorating your office with this Where’s Waldo mural. This novelty mural transforms an entire wall into a giant page from the iconic children’s activity book – allowing you to see everything in stunning detail.

posts.title: Posable Life Size Skeleton
posts.content: Set up the ultimate Halloween display using this posable life size skeleton. This bony fella stands just over five feet tall and features posable limbs that lock in place so you can position him in a number of funny and amusing positions.

posts.title: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Kit
posts.content: Increase your chances of staying alive when the undead rise up by carrying this zombie apocalypse survival  kit. This reusable tin comes jam packed with 24 items that are crucial for your survival, such as a fire starter, compass, and tactical card knife.

posts.title: Stick-N-Find Bluetooth Location Tracker
posts.content: Avoid misplacing your belongings with help from the Stick-N-Find Bluetooth location tracker. Simply stick this small tracker onto any item and open the app on your phone or tablet and you’ll be able to locate it within a 150 foot radius.
